message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is a unique opportunity that we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to us, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1,300,000. We understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, but we hope this offer will be mutually beneficial. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate,  $1,300,000 is still above my maximum budget.  I'm happy to purchase the product for $1,250,000. This price would be a fair compromise for both of us, and I believe it represents a good value for the product.
